title: The Library
additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. However, US imprints and advertisers are mentioned in some issues.  Some issues may also lack copyright notices.

Lack of renewals in the Copyright Office database was checked with command keyword searches for 'library AND bibliographic', 'library AND bibliographical', and 'library AND oxford AND (year)', where (year) was tried with all of the years from 1950 through 1963. (Searching 'library' by itself yields too many hits for their database interface to handle.)
